data.text: @ChristinaSole1 I'm sure it's Omicron which, if you have to get Covid, is the one you want. I had it a month ago. In my case no loss of appetite, smell or taste. Plenty of rest and water and you'll be fine Christina. Best of luck on speedy recovery

@ChristinaSole1 I can even keep up with the isolations periods  now tbh. We’ve all managed to swerve it. Just hoping we continue to as A has her GCSEs & really can’t afford anytime off school . Rest up daughter 😘
@LibbyLibbys61 Thanks Missus, I’m actually just pretty peeved as I’ve been in the house all week with the girls so it feels never ending at the minute
@ChristinaSole1 Rest up Tina & fingers crossed it’s not too bad. https://t.co/wOICIvghh9

@ChristinaSole1 Oh no Christina. I hope it's mild and passes quickly.

Take care & rest up.
@ChristinaSole1 Best wishes for a mild dose of it and a speedy recovery
